definitions.definition: Unisexual : having either male (with stamens ) or female (with pistil ) flowers, but not with both.
Known or expected to be polyphyletic , as of a form taxon .
Representing a continuing or repeated action.
labels: of a tense or verb form
definitions.label_groups: grammar , of a tense or verb form

definitions.definition: Lacking some elementary organ that is essential to successful or normal activity.

secondary_definitions: ( botany ) Unisexual : having either male (with stamens ) or female (with pistil ) flowers, but not with both.
( taxonomy ) Known or expected to be polyphyletic , as of a form taxon .
( grammar , of a tense or verb form ) Representing a continuing or repeated action.
( obsolete ) Lacking some elementary organ that is essential to successful or normal activity.
